thread.section_title: SSENSE Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of SSENSE | ssense.com | 7 of 61
thread.title: Rockne

author: Rockne
title: Rockne
text: Trustworthy reputation and verifiable retail clothing outlet. No fakes! High end clothing and the designers the SSense team chooses for the retail business attracted me because many are not featured elsewhere. The prices for Canadians is excellent. I would now in 2017 rather buy from Ssense online than Luisaviaroma because if you are at all fashion forward with an open mind to try new styles; the future of fashion and the present moment in fashion is always perfectly reflected on the Ssense website. Prices have also come down while Yoox, Far Fetch, and Luisaviaroma are all going way up. As a Canadian with our low dollar value, I won't shop anywhere else in the world including Calgary, Edmonton or Vancouver. Buy it from Montreal, buy is from Ssense.
